c DATA CARDS
mode n p
c dump every hr

c analog neutron transport
phys:n 1j 14
phys:p
sdef pos=0 0 0 erg=14.0 vec= 0 0 1 dir=d1
si1  -1 .93 1
sp1   0  0.0  1.0
